      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="973829417922453505" id="stream-item-tweet-973829417922453505" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;973829417922453505&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Yesterday I was honoured to Chair an All-Party Parliamentary Group aiming to raise the profile of the rare disease, Phenylketonuria (PKU). Here I am with members of the <a href="/NSPKU" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1371836238"><s>@</s><b>NSPKU</b></a><a href="https://t.co/JsJxSGKwUz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/JsJxSGKwUz</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Up to 12 million tonnes of plastic waste enters our oceans every year... 

Thank you <a href="/LizTwistMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="857641376628043778"><s>@</s><b>LizTwistMP</b></a>, <a href="/ChiOnwurah" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="82093305"><s>@</s><b>ChiOnwurah</b></a> and <a href="/JeffSmithetc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18951643"><s>@</s><b>JeffSmithetc</b></a> for asking about a deposit return scheme - an extremely effective method at reducing plastic waste (1/3)</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Id just like to echo Jons thanks to NHS staff and to our Gateshead council staff working to keep us safe in the snow. You are all brilliant!<a href="https://t.co/nTElcZR7hz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jonashworth/status/969200527488831489" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jonashworth/status/969200527488831489"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jonashworth/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/969200527488831489</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Liz Twist MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Its absolutely vital to drive up standards of patient care to limit mistakes. Yet 8 years of underfunding, cuts, rota gaps and 100,000 vacancies across the NHS put immense pressures on NHS staff.  Well get a safer NHS when we invest properly in it. Hope ministers recognise that</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Really important question asked by Chris Bryant. Brain Injury patients need effective rehab as well adimmediate care.<a href="https://t.co/tkVs6XqxKx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/rhonddabryant/status/966345242483023872" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/rhonddabryant/status/966345242483023872"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/rhonddabryant/</span><span class="invisible">status/966345242483023872</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Liz Twist MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today at PMQs I asked the Prime Minister to make sure Brain Injury patients across the UK have access to the full rehabilitation services they require <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ACytTNiC1E</span></div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to be able to speak in the <a href="/hashtag/WASPI?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WASPI</b></a> debate led by <a href="/grahamemorris" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="58821256"><s>@</s><b>grahamemorris</b></a>. I am asking the Government to meet the WASPI campaigners, explore solutions, look at transitional state pension arrangements, and make resolving this issue a priority for the 3.8 million women affected.</p>
</div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Barbara Keeley Retweeted RC of Psychiatrists</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Join call from <a href="/rcpsych" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15300222"><s>@</s><b>rcpsych</b></a> to <a href="/hashtag/StopMHCuts?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StopMHCuts</b></a> - if  do not come through children &amp; young people will continue to be turned away from mental health services as they are not ill enough<a href="https://t.co/n7dg4EVdFU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/rcpsych/status/934095599682641920" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/rcpsych/status/934095599682641920"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/rcpsych/status</span><span class="invisible">/934095599682641920</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Barbara Keeley added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/rcpsych/status/934095599682641920" data-conversation-id="934095599682641920" aria-hidden="true">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">RC of Psychiatrists</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>rcpsych</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Govt has repeatedly promised an additional 1b for <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mentalhealth</b></span>. <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="47092404"><s>@</s><b>NHSE</b></span> say budget means we may not get this. Join our campaign to <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StopMHCuts</b></span> - retweet and say how it will affect you if  does not come through.</div>

Time to scrap the cap &amp; give public sector workers the pay rise they deserve.<a href="https://t.co/CaqJvssfk9" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CaqJvssfk9</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/UKLabour" data-user-id="14291684">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/948955285862920193/bCUl6VHS_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

That money could be funding our public services. <a href="/hashtag/Budget2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Budget2017</b></a><a href="https://t.co/YE2WyVpMVv" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/YE2WyVpMVv</a></p>

          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">The Tories are failing to tackle tax avoidance</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">The Tories say theres no money for our public services, yet BILLIONS are being lost through tax avoidance every year. Its time the super-rich and giant corporations paid their fair share.</div>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Liz Twist MP Retweeted Labour North</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Very pleased to attend a meeting with <a href="/beatED" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25311240"><s>@</s><b>beatED</b></a> to look at the latest research on eating disorders throughout the UK. Shows on average, people wait a shocking 3 &amp; a half years between symptoms developing and treatment starting. I look forward to working with Beat in the future.</p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LizTwistMP" data-user-id="857641376628043778">

If you're worried about what to say or do, have a look at these tips to help you get started <a href="/hashtag/SmallTalkSavesLives?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SmallTalkSavesLives</b></a> <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f5e8.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Left speech bubble" aria-label="Emoji: Left speech bubble" /><a href="https://t.co/UbmkndO06m" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/5vUM30gAHCC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/5vUM30gAHCC"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/5vUM30gAHCC</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a> today, I revealed a letting agent has issued all of its tenants with eviction notices because Universal Credit is likely to mean they can't pay their rent.

Read the owner's response and his message to <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>Theresa_May</b></a>:<a href="https://t.co/s5kvrnIuOJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/corbyn-reveals-hundreds-of-families-to-be-evicted-over-universal-credit-fears-of-letting-agent-pmqs_uk_5a0c39a1e4b0b17ffce1802c/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/corbyn-reveals-hundreds-of-families-to-be-evicted-over-universal-credit-fears-of-letting-agent-pmqs_uk_5a0c39a1e4b0b17ffce1802c/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/corbyn-r</span><span class="invisible">eveals-hundreds-of-families-to-be-evicted-over-universal-credit-fears-of-letting-agent-pmqs_uk_5a0c39a1e4b0b17ffce1802c/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Seven years of Tory cuts and failure have pushed our public services into crisis. At next weeks Budget the Government must change course, follow Labours lead and provide these vital services with the funding they need.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yes it was good to get out and talk to folk - and the wind blew the cobwebs away!<a href="https://t.co/hJfcJ5uCsM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/cmchughlabour/status/924240548881367040" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/cmchughlabour/status/924240548881367040"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/cmchughlabour/</span><span class="invisible">status/924240548881367040</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Liz Twist MP added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Liz Twist MP Retweeted Gateshead West NPT</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Good result - thanks to the Gateshead West Neighbourhood team!<a href="https://t.co/XOPAdPSgKg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/npcgatesheadw/status/923350532978302977" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/npcgatesheadw/status/923350532978302977"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/npcgatesheadw/</span><span class="invisible">status/923350532978302977</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </li>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today is wear it pink today. I'm wearing pink to help prevent
breast cancer taking the lives of those we love.<a href="https://t.co/1brqbDjrDe" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1brqbDjrDe</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I am supporting <a href="/Emma4facs" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="277466861"><s>@</s><b>Emma4facs</b></a> &amp; <a href="/JanetWilliams99" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="250163834"><s>@</s><b>JanetWilliams99</b></a>, the INFACT national campaign on <a href="/hashtag/valproatecrisis?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>valproatecrisis</b></a> which will today be debated in the HoC.</p>

What can be done? Learn the facts now  <a href="/hashtag/FixUniversalCredit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FixUniversalCredit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/V7D12PhGQb" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/V7D12PhGQb</a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Tories dont think our Armed Forces deserve a proper pay rise. But we do. Its time to <a href="/hashtag/scrapthecap?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>scrapthecap</b></a> for Armed Forces pay. With us? RT <a href="https://t.co/Ch3jyhlhPT" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Ch3jyhlhPT</a></p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">On Wednesday I'll be voting to <a href="/hashtag/scrap?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>scrap</b></a> the cap on NHS pay<a href="https://t.co/Y1r2Scy2cY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jonashworth/status/906828827573309440" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jonashworth/status/906828827573309440"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jonashworth/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/906828827573309440</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">On Wednesday we're bringing a vote to the House of Commons on NHS pay.     <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Justin Madders MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>justinmadders</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The Government's u turn on the privatisation of NHS Professionals is great news, but how much money was wasted on it?</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tory economic management = letting 36bn a year slip through your fingers in lost tax. We cant afford not to get tough on tax dodgers. RT <a href="https://t.co/7AamiITJIK" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/7AamiITJIK</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">
  <div class="AdaptiveMedia-videoContainer">
      <div class="PlayableMedia PlayableMedia--video PlayableMedia--hasMetadata watched">


  <div class="PlayableMedia-container">
    <div class="PlayableMedia-player&#10;        &#10;        " data-playable-media-url="" data-use-react-player="" data-border-top-left-radius="" data-border-top-right-radius="" data-border-bottom-left-radius="" data-border-bottom-right-radius="" style="padding-bottom: 100.0%; background-image:url('https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DI5RgbeXcAA9i1y.jpg')">
    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">It's time to get tough on tax dodgers</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">36 billion. Thats how much tax the Tories are letting slip through their fingers each year by failing to tackle the tax dodgers. Lets put that money back where it belongs  in the public purse.</div>
        </div>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>
</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Britains workers deserve a break. Thats why well introduce four new bank holidays. With us? Hit RT.<a href="https://t.co/zQe2vdsubk" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/zQe2vdsubk</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        ">

          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">

      <div class="PlayableMedia PlayableMedia--video PlayableMedia--hasMetadata watched">


  <div class="PlayableMedia-container">
    <div class="PlayableMedia-player&#10;        &#10;        " data-playable-media-url="" data-use-react-player="" data-border-top-left-radius="" data-border-top-right-radius="" data-border-bottom-left-radius="" data-border-bottom-right-radius="" style="padding-bottom: 100.0%; background-image:url('https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DIFut8fWsAArlVH.jpg')">
    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">Our plan for four new bank holidays</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">We know that bank holidays are important for relaxing and spending time with loved ones. Thats why we want to introduce four new ones, to bring our four nations together. Sound good? Share our plan.</div>
        </div>
  </div>

    </div>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-894923937792110597">

How much longer can we carry on allowing children's &amp; adolescent's mental health services to be neglected?<a href="https://t.co/KDRSy96PKg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/aug/03/judge-warns-of-blood-on-our-hands-if-suicidal-girl-is-forced-out-of-secure-care" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/aug/03/judge-warns-of-blood-on-our-hands-if-suicidal-girl-is-forced-out-of-secure-care"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/a</span><span class="invisible">ug/03/judge-warns-of-blood-on-our-hands-if-suicidal-girl-is-forced-out-of-secure-care</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Liz Twist MP Retweeted The Labour Party</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Bus &amp; train fares up by 27% since 2010 after Ministers cut support for services in last Parliament. Labour will put passengers before profit<a href="https://t.co/k6VRRYaCoP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/892793284875218944" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/892793284875218944"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/892793284875218944</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today we provided 3 days emergence food to 47 adults AND 14 children across Gateshead.

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Meeting some <a href="/theRCN" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="54506896"><s>@</s><b>theRCN</b></a> nurses on the frontline, keeping our <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> going. They are underpaid, overworked and deserve better! <a href="/hashtag/scrapthecap?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>scrapthecap</b></a><a href="https://t.co/mHbEI8ISMw" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/mHbEI8ISMw</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Liz Twist MP Retweeted The Independent</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great victory for <a href="/unisontweets" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15230159"><s>@</s><b>unisontweets</b></a> &amp; employees seeking justice. The Supreme Court has ruled that tribunal fees of up to 1200 are unlawful.<a href="https://t.co/mXxIjXZDyz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Independent/status/890167301395316738" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Independent/status/890167301395316738"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Independent/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/890167301395316738</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Liz Twist MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Independent/status/890167301395316738" data-conversation-id="890167301395316738" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="890167301395316738" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Independent" data-user-id="16973333" href="/Independent/status/890167301395316738" data-conversation-id="890167301395316738" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The Independent</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Independent</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The Government has been forced to repay all those it charged to take their rogue employers to tribunal <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ind.pn/2eNaOm2" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ind.pn/2eNaOm2"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ind.pn/2eNaOm2</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileTweet-actionCountList u-hiddenVisually">
    
    
    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--reply u-hiddenVisually">
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="1">

  </div>

  </span>

  </button>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At tonight's <a href="/hashtag/BBCdebate?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BBCdebate</b></a> I'll set out our vision of a Britain <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a>. Will <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>Theresa_May</b></a> come &amp; defend her record of working for the few?<a href="https://t.co/OCFgWQsbWY" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OCFgWQsbWY</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">She may turn up Or she may not. Theresa May is treating the public with contempt by refusing to debate Jeremy. Agree? RT  <a href="/hashtag/BBCDebate?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BBCDebate</b></a><a href="https://t.co/igtsIJBEXV" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/igtsIJBEXV</a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">10</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

It takes 2 mins: <a href="https://t.co/5CsLmqeuNm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://gov.uk/register-to-vote" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://gov.uk/register-to-vote"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/register-to-vo</span><span class="invisible">te</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/RegisterToVote?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RegisterToVote</b></a><a href="https://t.co/w2L7QG6nWK" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/w2L7QG6nWK</a></p>

Share our promise to workers <a href="https://t.co/XwJxTsCdsl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.labour.org.uk/index.php/workers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=MinimumWage" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.labour.org.uk/index.php/workers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=MinimumWage"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">labour.org.uk/index.php/work</span><span class="invisible">ers/?utm_source=Twitter&amp;utm_campaign=MinimumWage</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">230</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">230</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

    <div class="feedback-actions">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We created the NHS  and well save it. Here's <a href="/JonAshworth" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="143212610"><s>@</s><b>JonAshworth</b></a> setting out our pledges to NHS staff. Share the news  <a href="/hashtag/VoteLabour?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>VoteLabour</b></a><a href="https://t.co/FdOfROCDBm" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/FdOfROCDBm</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        " data-autoplaying-media="true">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">
  <div class="AdaptiveMedia-videoContainer">
      <div class="PlayableMedia PlayableMedia--video PlayableMedia--hasMetadata watched">


  <div class="PlayableMedia-container">
    <div class="PlayableMedia-player&#10;        &#10;        " data-playable-media-url="" data-use-react-player="" data-border-top-left-radius="" data-border-top-right-radius="" data-border-bottom-left-radius="" data-border-bottom-right-radius="" style="padding-bottom: 100.0%; background-image:url('https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C-XCrk3WAAIM8Sq.jpg')">
    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">Our pledges to NHS staff</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">We created the NHS  and well save the NHS. Labour will scrap the pay cap on NHS staff wages; bring back bursaries; and enshrine safe staffing levels into law. With us? Share this video.</div>

      </div>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <div id="sms-codes-dialog" class="modal-container">
  <div class="modal modal-medium draggable">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <button type="button" class="modal-btn modal-close js-close">
  <span class="Icon Icon--close Icon--medium">
    <span class="visuallyhidden">Close</span>
  </span>
</button>

      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title">Two-way (sending and receiving) short codes:</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">

      <td>(any)</td>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
